remarks: Deduction quantifying both antecedent and consequent, based on Theorem 19.22 of [Margaris] p. 90.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Jan-2020.)
statement:
reximd2a.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
reximd2a.2 $e |- ( ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) /\ ps ) -> x e. B ) $.
reximd2a.3 $e |- ( ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) /\ ps ) -> ch ) $.
reximd2a.4 $e |- ( ph -> E. x e. A ps ) $.
reximd2a $p |- ( ph -> E. x e. B ch ) $.
